verbose_text: To address this question, we first tested whether the structure formation of Ald4p (noMTS)-GFP can be triggered by adding its substrate, acetaldehyde, to the log-phase culture of yeast ALD4 (noMTS) : : GFP (none or very few cells showed structures at this stage of growth).
evidence: Ald4p(noMTS)-GFP can be triggered by adding its substrate, acetaldehyde
